mapper.select: SELECT EVENT_ID AS evtId, EVENT_NAME AS evtName, FORM_DT AS fromDt, TO_DT AS toDt, PROFILE AS profile FROM EVENT ORDER BY evtId DESC LIMIT #{start}, 8
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM EVENT
SELECT EVENT_ID AS evtId, EVENT_NAME AS evtName, FORM_DT AS fromDt, TO_DT AS toDt, PROFILE AS profile FROM EVENT WHERE EVENT_ID = #{evtId}

SELECT EVENT_ID AS evtId, EVENT_NAME AS evtName, FORM_DT AS fromDt, TO_DT AS toDt, PROFILE AS profile FROM EVENT WHERE ${column} LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{keyword},'%') ORDER BY EVENT_ID DESC LIMIT #{start}, 3
